Uses of NArmedBanditProb in edu.cuny.ai.learning.prob
 

Subclasses of NArmedBanditProb in edu.cuny.ai.learning.prob
 class DymEqualRewardsNArmedBanditProb
          implements an n-armed problem with which rewards of different arms are following an identical normal distribution.
 class DymVaryingRewardsNArmedBanditProb
          implements an n-armed problem with which rewards of different arms are following different normal distribution.
 class StaticEqualRewardsNArmedBanditProb
          implements an n-armed problem whose arms return the same constant reward.
 class StaticVaryingRewardsNArmedBanditProb
          implements an n-armed problem with which arms return constant but varying reward.
